doc.title: Nunchaku
doc.plot: Nunchaku explores the journey of a young urban warrior forced to face his demons. Deelo is violently attacked by an intruder at his home, left beaten and bruised. From this moment Deelo's life is shattered throwing him into a world of fear. His desire to extract revenge on the assailant becomes an overwhelming force as his fantasies blur into reality. In the end the ultimate choice he makes as a warrior will change his life forever.
